author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-5553 System property for client tracing -Dderby.client.traceDirectory does not work with XADataSource

author: markt
msg: Use the new method to set socket timeouts
Add support for a separate keepalive timeout

author: markt
msg: Add the keptAlive flag (copied from APR) so that the first requst uses a blocking read as there should be data to read immediately after the connection has been established.
Use the new method to set timeouts.
